title-part.text: PRODUCTION OF PRODUCER GAS, WATER-GAS, SYNTHESIS GAS FROM SOLID CARBONACEOUS MATERIAL, OR MIXTURES CONTAINING THESE GASES

reference.text: synthesis gas from liquid or gaseous hydrocarbons C01B; underground gasification of minerals E21B43/295

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Production of fuel gases by carburetting air or other gases without pyrolysis
with materials which are liquid at ordinary temperatures
by passage of air through or over the surface of the liquid
with the liquid absorbed on carriers
Controlling the supply of liquid in accordance with the air supply
Carburetting by pyrolysis of solid carbonaceous material in a fuel bed
Carburetting by pyrolysis of solid carbonaceous material in a carburettor
Adding materials to prevent vapour deposition
Controlling humidity of the air or gas to be carburetted
Production of combustible gases containing carbon monoxide from solid carbonaceous fuels
Cyclic processes, e.g. alternate blast and run
simultaneously reacting oxygen and water with the carbonaceous material
Arrangements or dispositions of valves or flues
to permit flow of gases or vapours other than upwardly through the fuel bed
Devices for distributing fuel evenly over the bed or for stirring up the fuel bed
Gasification of granular or pulverulent flues in suspension

CPC-specific-text.text: for gasifiers with stationary fluidised bed
for gasifiers with stationary fluidised bed

title-part.text: Gasification of granular or pulverulent fuels by the Winkler technique, i.e. by fluidisation
Gasification using molten salts or metals
combined with pre-distillation of the fuel
with separate withdrawal of the distillation products
with decomposition of the distillation products
by introducing them into the gasification zone

CPC-specific-text.text: Multistage gasification, e.g. plural parallel or serial gasification stages
Controlling or regulating the gasification process

title-part.text: with arrangements for preheating the blast or the water vapour
with means for removing dust or tar from the gas
Catalysts as integral part of gasifiers

reference.text: catalysts added to the feed C10J2300/0986

title-part.text: Mechanical details of gasifiers not otherwise provided for, e.g. sealing means
Nozzles or lances for introducing gas, liquids or suspensions
Sluices, e.g. mechanical sluices for preventing escape of gas through the feed inlet
Mobile gasifiers, e.g. for use in cars, ships or containers
Moving parts inside the gasification reactor not otherwise provided for

reference.text: devices for distributing fuel evenly over a fixed bed C10J3/32

title-part.text: Details of the feed, e.g. feeding of spent catalyst, inert gas or halogens
Physical processes, e.g. shredding, comminuting, chopping, sorting
Sludge, e.g. from water treatment plant
Slurries comprising bio-oil or bio-coke, i.e. charcoal, obtained, e.g. by fast pyrolysis of biomass
Coal fines for producing water gas
Coal fines for producing producer gas
Waste, e.g. MSW, tires, glass, tar sand, peat, paper, lignite, oil shale
Exhaust gas from an external process for purification
Hydrocarbons as additives to gasifying agents to improve caloric properties
Inert particles, e.g. as heat exchange medium in a fluidized or moving bed, heat carriers, sand
by radiating device, e.g. radiant tubes
by renewable energy, e.g. solar energy, photovoltaic cells, wind
Integration of gasification processes with another plant or parts within the plant
Post-reduction, e.g. on a red-white-hot coke or coal bed
CO2-separation and sequestration, i.e. long time storage
Modification of synthesis gas composition, e.g. to meet some criteria
Conversion of synthesis gas to energy

reference.text: gasification of solids in fuel cells H01M8/0643

title-part.text: integrated with a gas turbine or gas motor

reference.text: gas turbine plants provided with a gas producer F02C3/28; engines using solid fuels F02B43/08

title-part.text: integrated in a gasification combined cycle [IGCC]

reference.text: engines driven by heat coming from a gasification or pyrolysis unit F01K23/067

title-part.text: Conversion of synthesis gas to chemicals

reference.text: production of synthetic natural gas C10L3/08

title-part.text: to alcohols, e.g. methanol or ethanol

reference.text: preparation of alcohols in general C07C29/00

title-part.text: making use of a steam turbine

reference.text: separating gases using rectification of air F25J3/04521

title-part.text: with biological plants, e.g. involving bacteria, algae, fungi

reference.text: treatment of water in general or water purification C02F

title-part.text: with storage facilities for intermediate, feed and/or product
with phase separation, e.g. after condensation
Details of the gasification process, e.g. loops, autothermal operation
Recycle loops, e.g. gas, solids, heating medium, water

reference.text: cyclic processes in fixed bed gasification C10J3/04

title-part.text: Autothermal gasification by injection of oxygen or steam
Partial oxidation, i.e. injection of air or oxygen only
Steam reforming, i.e. injection of steam only
Heat exchange between at least two process streams
with one stream being air, oxygen or ozone
with one stream being combustion gas
with one stream being synthesis gas
